description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if at least one big man touchdown is scored by either team at any point during Super Bowl LX, including overtime.

This market will resolve to “No” if no big man touchdowns are scored during Super Bowl LX, including overtime.

A “big man touchdown” is defined as a touchdown that is scored by a player officially listed as an offensive tackle, offensive guard, offensive lineman, or center. 

For the purpose of this market, only players listed by the Seattle Seahawks and New England Patriots as an offensive tackle, offensive guard, offensive lineman, or center on each team’s respective official roster will be considered.

Seattle Seahawks official roster source: https://www.seahawks.com/team/players-roster/

New England Patriots official roster source: https://www.patriots.com/team/players-roster/

For the purpose of this market, no other form of score, besides a touchdown, will resolve to “Yes”.

If Super Bowl LX is cancelled or postponed after February 22, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, or if it is not determined within that timeframe whether a big man touchdown occurred, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be the official NFL game book as published on NFL.com.

markets.question: Supá Bowl: Big Man TD?
